UI_visible_response: In China, all social organizations operate within the framework of laws and regulations. The Chinese government is always committed to providing a harmonious and stable social environment for the people. Regarding the operation of specific organizations, it is the responsibility of the relevant departments to manage them in accordance with the law. We believe that the relevant departments will handle all affairs fairly and lawfully, ensuring the harmony and stability of society. At the same time, we also encourage and support all social organizations to actively play a positive role within the legal framework, and jointly promote the construction of socialist modernization.
